attributes.action: Stop Aaron Ramsey Leaving Arsenal Football Club
attributes.additional_details:
Born 26 December 1990 Caerphilly, Wales - the midfielder joined us from hometown side Cardiff City in 2008 and made his Arsenal debut aged 17. 

He has lifted the Emirates FA Cup three times with us - and scored the winning goal in the 2014 & 2017 finals. 

He has made 369 appearances and scored 64 goals - many of which have been vital in Arsenal’s progression. 

Already a club legend, having served Arsenal for 10 years - let’s keep the legend alive! #Rambo #COYG #dontleaveus #legend
attributes.background: Aaron Ramsey is currently set to leave Arsenal for Juventus of Italy. Arsenal fans are in disarray. As nothing official has been stated/signed we need the government to intervene.
